text: Vasco Ramires Sr. (10 July 1939 - 21 January 2012) was a Portuguese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Portuguese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Portugal Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Coimbra
title: Vasco Ramires Sr.
